source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/linnykos/561_s2024_public/main/HW2_files/random_graph_functions.R")
generate_partial_clique <- function(n, p) {
  # n: Number of nodes in the graph
  # p: Probability of an edge being present between any two nodes

  # Create an empty adjacency matrix
  adj_matrix <- matrix(0, nrow = n, ncol = n)

  # Populate the adjacency matrix with edges based on probability p
  for (i in 1:(n-1)) {
    for (j in (i+1):n) {
      # Generate an edge with probability p
      if (runif(1) < p) {
        adj_matrix[i, j] <- 1
        adj_matrix[j, i] <- 1
      }
    }
  }
  
  # Return the adjacency matrix representing the partial clique
  return(adj_matrix)
}
